mapper.insert: insert into user (id, name, sex, age, mobile, create_time, update_time, ext_fields) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{extFields,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into user
id,
name,
sex,
age,
mobile,
create_time,
update_time,
ext_fields,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ext_fields = #{extFields,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ext_fields = #{extFields,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
